title: RIOT WONT RESPOND TO THIS QUESTION.....
body: FROM LVL 2 HONOR STRAIGHT TO LVL 0 HONOR FROM 1 MATCH ?????? THAT'S A BIT UNFAIR DON'T YOU THINK. I JUST REACHED LVL 62 IN 1 MONTH AND RIOT TRYING TO GET ME BANNED...... I PUT A LOT OF WORK INTO THIS ACCOUNT FOR YOU GUYS TO TRY AND FUCK ME OVER SO I LOSE ALL MY CHARACTERS/SKINS PLUS ALL THE HOURS I PUT INTO THIS GAME. I DON'T THINK ITS REASONABLE.

replies.body: simple. you went to 0 honour because being toxic means you have 0 honour. dont be toxic you wont lose honour.

A statement with question marks and questions with periods instead.
No wonder Riot won't respond, they're probably confused.
